Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to penalties and enforcement of adult-use cannabis laws
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of taxation and finance to revoke the certificate of registration of the sale of adult-use cannabis; increases certain penalties relating to the sale of illicit cannabis; authorizes the commissioner of taxation and finance and the duly authorized representatives of the office of cannabis management to provide enforcement; makes it a class A misdemeanor for a distributor of adult-use cannabis products or a retail seller of adult-use cannabis products to sell any such products while not registered to do so.
LawCode: Amd §§494 & 496-c, add §§496-d & 1814-b, Tax L; amd §16, Cannabis L; amd §222.00, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to making certain technical corrections to tax on adult-use cannabis pursuant to article 20-C of such law; to amend the cannabis law, in relation to certain penalties; and to amend the penal law, in relation to clarifying the definition of selling cannabis
